scripts.build:chrome: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/modules dist/lib && cp manifest.chrome.json dist/manifest.json && cp sidepanel.html sidepanel.js styles.css background.js content.js ollama-bridge.html icon*.png dist/ && cp modules/*.js dist/modules/ && cp lib/*.js dist/lib/
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf dist-firefox && mkdir -p dist-firefox/modules dist-firefox/lib && cp manifest.firefox.json dist-firefox/manifest.json && cp sidepanel.html sidepanel.js styles.css background.js content.js ollama-bridge.html icon*.png dist-firefox/ && cp modules/*.js dist-firefox/modules/ && cp lib/*.js dist-firefox/lib/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
